/*UseSearchMapper.getUsgListByCtrt*/
SELECT B.CUST_NM /* 고객명 */ ,A.CTRT_ID /* 계약번호 */ ,(SELECT PROD_NM FROM TPMPD_PROD WHERE PROD_CD = A.PROD_CD) AS PROD_NM /* 상품명 */ ,'' AS USG_STRT_DTM /* 사용일자 */ ,'' AS TOTAL_USG_NOU /* 사용도수 */ ,'' AS USG_TYP /* 사용유형 */ ,'' AS USG_TYP_NM /* 사용유형명 */ ,0 AS TOTAL_USG_CHRG /* 이용금액 */ ,0 AS DEDUCTED_CHARGE /* 공제금액 */ ,0 AS DISC_CHRG /* 할인금액 */ ,'' AS TOTAL_RATED_CHRG /* 과금금액 */ ,'' AS CHRG_C /* 과금코드 */ ,'' AS CHRG_CD_NM /* 과금항목명 */ FROM TCMCT_CTRT_INFO A ,TCMCU_CUST_INFO B WHERE 1=1
AND A.SO_ID = #{soId} /* INPUT 사업 */
AND A.CTRT_ID = #{ctrtId} /* INPUT 계약ID 'C000000341'*/
AND SUBSTR(A.RATE_STRT_DT, 1, 6) = #{useYymm} /* INPUT 사용년월 임시INPUT '202002'*/
AND A.ORDER_TP = #{orderTp} /* INPUT 사용유형 임시INPUT '101'*/
AND A.OPEN_DD BETWEEN #{useStDt} AND #{useEdDt} /* INPUT 사용기간 FROM TO 임시INPUT '20200201' '20200210'*/
AND A.INACT_DTTM = '99991231235959' AND A.CUST_ID = B.CUST_ID
